text: Seimata Chilia (born 2 August 1978 in Port Vila) is a Vanuatuan international footballer who plays for Amical as a midfielder. ==Career== ===Club career=== Fasavalu began his career in Vanuatu with Tupuji Imere. Also he played in Australia for Fawkner Blues and in Fiji for Suva and in Vanuatu for Yatel. In 2010, he moved to Amical. ===International career=== Chilia has played at international level for Vanuatu. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Suva F.C. players Category:Expatriate footballers in Fiji Category:Vanuatuan footballers Category:Vanuatu international footballers Category:Vanuatuan expatriate footballers Category:Vanuatuan expatriate sportspeople in Fiji Category:Association football midfielders Category:Vanuatuan expatriate sportspeople in Australia Category:Expatriate soccer players in Australia
title: Seimata Chilia
